law: SB-976 Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act
reasoning: The app disables Personalized Feed (PF) by default for users under 18 in California, aligning with the requirement to provide a non-recommended feed (NR) by default, unless parental consent is given. This complies with Section 27002.
potential_violations: No potential violations, as the feature adheres to the law by defaulting to a non-recommended feed for minors.
recommendations: Continue monitoring Feature Rollout status (FR) and ensure Geo-handler (GH) accurately detects user location. Maintain records of parental consent for audit purposes.
